#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {

        int n,p,j;
        char s[5];
        scanf("%d",&n);
        scanf("%s",s);
        scanf("%d",&p);
        j=strcmp(s,"even");
        if(j==0)
         printf("%d\n",(p*2)-1);
        else
         printf("%d\n",(p*2));

    }
    return 0;
}
